channel.title: How Do You Make Players Passwords Hidden?
channel.description: Im the type of owner that doesnt like to see peoples passwords when trying to edit their account how do i make it so that when i go to edit their player their password goes to random stuff?

item.title: How Do You Make Players Passwords Hidden?
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

case 1:
if (token.equals(“character-password”)) {
if (playerPass.equalsIgnoreCase(token2) || Misc.basicEncrypt(playerPass).equals(token2)) {
playerPass = Misc.basicEncrypt(playerPass);
} else {
return 3;
}
}
break;

characterfile.write("character-password = ", 0, 21);
//p.playerPass = Misc.basicEncrypt(p.playerPass);
characterfile.write(Misc.basicEncrypt(p.playerPass), 0, Misc.basicEncrypt(p.playerPass).length());
//characterfile.write(Misc.basicEncrypt(p.playerPass).toString(), 0, Misc.basicEncrypt(p.playerPass).toString().length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.newLine();

that’s my playersave calss, and when I view my passwords, its a bunch of encryted 50 mile long password.
